Oct. 23-Oct. 28

We are staying overnight in Cedar Park this weekend. See hotel info below.
  • Monday Oct. 23: Rehearsal 6-9 p.m. SHS Band Lot/Stadium
  • Tuesday Oct. 24: Rehearsal 4:30-7 p.m. SHS Band Lot
  • Wednesday Oct. 25: No rehearsal
  • Thursday Oct. 26: Rehearsal 4:30-7 p.m. SHS Band Lot
  • Friday Oct. 27: Football game @ Marble Falls
    • 3:10 p.m.: Uniform Checkout/Load Trailer
    • 3:45 p.m.: Meal Deal Available
    • 4:30 p.m.: Inspection
    • 4:45 p.m.: Depart for Marble Falls
    • 7:30 p.m.: Kickoff
    • 9:00 p.m.: Halftime performance
    • 10:00 p.m.: Snack, load and depart for hotel
    • 11:30 p.m.: Lights out

Guard Uniform: Uniform, gauntlets, headphones, long black socks, black shoes.

Dress in layers, it will be chilly this weekend.
  • Saturday Oct. 28: UIL Area Contest @ Cedar Park
    • 5:30 a.m.: Wake/Breakfast
    • 6:15 a.m.: Depart hotel
    • 6:30 a.m.: Rehearsal at Westwood HS
      • 12400 Mellow Meadow Dr. Austin, TX 78750
    • 8:00 a.m.: Depart for contest
    • 8:15 a.m.: Arrive at Gupton Stadium
      • 200 Gupton Way Dr. Cedar Park, TX 78613
    • 9:10 a.m.: Warm-up
    • 9:40 a.m.: Move
    • 9:50 a.m.: Gate
    • 10:00 a.m.: Perform
    • 10:30 a.m.-7:14 p.m.: Load, lunch, downtime and dinner
    • 7:15 p.m.: Drum Major Retreat and announcement of finalists
    • 8:45 p.m.: Finals begin
    • 11:45 p.m.: Finals Awards
    • 12:30 a.m.: Depart for Seguin
    • 2:00 a.m.: Arrive at Seguin HS, unload trailer and parent pickup

Hotel Info

LaQuinta Inn and Suites Austin-Cedar Park 1010 E. Whitestone Blvd. Cedar Park, TX 78613

Comfort Inn Cedar Park 300 E Whitestone Blvd. Cedar Park, TX 78613
